posts.content:
Having a clear out, everything must go before house move!

Diamond cut rear bumper, overall good condition but appears to be a little wavy, probably fixable. Has holes for towel rails. £100 ono
Slash cut rear bumper, a bit rusty but no holes. Oddly has one overrider tacked on, can take off if required. Holes for towel rails £85 ono """under offer"""
Very solid LHD ball joint beam, dismantled but with arms and brakes . late split early bay (balljoints shot) £200 ono

Gearbox , reduction boxes and brakes, no nose cone from my 63 split all good for refurb AO code £100 ono
5 x 14" wide 5 wheels and tyres, tyres ok for rolling your bus around £100 ono """ under offer"""
2 x original sun-visors, white, used and a little grubby but no tears £30 ono """SOLD""""
pop out glass, some scratches but otherwise ok £10 """ SOLD""""
4 into 1 exhaust, 2 J pipes and EMPI silencer, just need a clean up and paint £35 ono
2 genuine VW heat exchangers, cleaned and painted, old but usable £50 ono
N/S Lower corner repair section, unused, Schofield part 22 £15
Pair of front head lights, could be LHD not sure, came off my imported split, but had and MOT will try to find out for sure. not in bad condition £100 """under offer"""
2 x church key engine lids, one mostly repaired plus the rest of the doner, after stripping I found the light housing was dented. All repairable but I decided to go for a new one in the end due to time scales. £200
2 x US spec rear light units complete with lenses and surrounds £50
4 original hub caps nice ratty patina, one a little dented use as is or re-chrome, £50 ono
Wide but shallow Claude's Buggies sump and cover, fitted but not used, around £170 normally, take £100 ono
Pair of engine front pulleys, one is EMPI, black, the other plain aluminium, £15 each ono
Pair of air scoops, fibreglass, white need a little tlc but very usable £10 the pair
Dash grab handle, light grey, new but a little grubby, will clean up ok £15 """"SOLD""""
Pair of cream interior pull handles new £10 """ sold"""
Set of drop gates for crew cab, have been sandblasted and primed, require restoration, but not too bad, no fittings, just gates. £500 no offers
Webber carb, was fitted to my split engine, i never ran it but it looked pretty new about 13 years ago! £20
Dash grab handle, ratty and old but usable £10
Pair of EMPI rocker covers, never used, a bit grubby have been sitting around for a few years but seals still fine, £40
Petrol filler cap lock, church key style off my '63, £10
2 x type 3 oil coolers, one a bit grazed £25 the pair

Will list other stuff soon, do ask if you are after something. I'll try to upload pics soon, am happy to email them till then

hopefully this link to photo bucket should work, here are pictures of all the parts listed http://s264.photobucket.com/user/63dubl ... for%20sale

I'll be going to Sandown park on the Sat, so could take some of the smaller parts if anyone is interested.

Feel free to call me on 07540 116680 with any questions, cheers, Martin
Pics of the crew cab gates please . pm'd
I'll take the pair of interior grab handles, pm sent
Hi mate do you still have gearbox and what's the code for it cheers adam
Hi mate, is the ao gearbox still available and if so is this for a straight axle or irs,thanks Adam
Hi do you still have the reduction boxes?
Hi, I'll take the hub caps please.
I'll take the dash grab handle if you can post it? Can you send me a photo of the drop gates?

Could I take the air scoops and black empi pulley please.

Also empi rocker covers please.

Postage ok? Pm sent
Hi do you still have the reduction boxes?
